titles.title: CB 6 How Lovely is Your Dwelling Place, Lord My God #6

properties.copyright: 1974,1981 Lion of Judah Music (Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HOW LOVELY IS YOUR DWELLING PLACE, O
LORD MY GOD.
My soul longs and yearns for Your courts.
And I would rather be a doorkeeper in Your
house,
Than to live my life somewhere else.
You are my Sun and my Shield,
You are my Beloved from the start,
And the highway to Your city runs through my
heart.
